The Third Angel's Message in our Schools 

     In the book of Revelation we read of a special work that God desires to have His people do in these last days. He has revealed His law and shown us the truth for 
                                                                           128
this time. This truth is constantly unfolding, and God designs that we shall be intelligent in regard to it, that we may be able to distinguish between right and wrong, between righteousness and unrighteousness.
